text:
Exscientia | Software Engineers | Oxford (UK), Dundee (UK) | Full-time | ONSITE | https://www.exscientia.co.uk/careers/

Exscientia (exscientia.co.uk) pioneered the emerging pharmatech sector and is the first company to design drug molecules entirely by artificial intelligence that are heading into the clinic. We are neither a traditional biotechnology nor typical software development company - our mission is to design better drugs, faster using the latest science, best software engineering practices and the knowledge acquired from experienced medicinal chemists.

We are currently seeking full-stack and backend engineers, who could either be working from our Oxford or Dundee office in the UK. Full job listings:

- Software Engineer: Full-Stack Developer (Oxford) -> http://bit.ly/2Qgublj

- Software Engineer: Full-Stack Developer (Dundee) -> http://bit.ly/2RB1foq

- Software Engineer: Backend Developer (Oxford) -> http://bit.ly/2zt1LxA

- Software Engineer: Backend Developer (Dundee) -> http://bit.ly/2JGrze8

For these roles, we are only considering applicants who can prove eligibility to work in the UK.
